trans-unit.source: Allows programmatic access to the HTML <see langword="<select>" /> element on the server.
trans-unit.target: Permite o acesso programático ao elemento <see langword="<select>" /> HTML no servidor.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control to create a selection box.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> controle para criar uma caixa de seleção.

trans-unit.source: Specify item listings in the control by placing HTML `<option>` elements between the opening and closing `<select>` tags.
trans-unit.target: Especificar listas de item no controle colocando HTML `<option>` elementos entre a abertura e fechamento `<select>` marcas.

trans-unit.source: Each item is represented by a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem?displayProperty=nameWithType> object.
trans-unit.target: Cada item é representado por um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem?displayProperty=nameWithType> objeto.

trans-unit.source: To specify the text that is displayed for each item in the control, you can set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem.Text%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property of the item, or simply place text between the opening and closing `<option>` tags.
trans-unit.target: Para especificar o texto que é exibido para cada item no controle, você pode definir o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem.Text%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> propriedade do item, ou simplesmente insira o texto entre a abertura e fechamento `<option>` marcas.

trans-unit.source: By setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem.Value%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property of the item, you can associate a value with the item that is different from the text.
trans-unit.target: Definindo o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem.Value%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> propriedade do item, você pode associar um valor com o item que é diferente do texto.

trans-unit.source: To select an item from the list by default, set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem.Selected%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property of the item to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Para selecionar um item da lista, por padrão, defina o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem.Selected%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> propriedade do item a ser `true`.

trans-unit.source: You can control the appearance and behavior of the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Size%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Multiple%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: Você pode controlar a aparência e comportamento do <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> controle definindo o <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Size%2A> e <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Multiple%2A> propriedades.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Size%2A> property specifies the height (in rows) of the control.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Size%2A> propriedade especifica a altura (em linhas) do controle.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Multiple%2A> property specifies whether more than one item can be concurrently selected in the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Multiple%2A> propriedade especifica se mais de um item pode ser selecionado simultaneamente no <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> controle.

trans-unit.source: By default, the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control is displayed as a drop-down list box.
trans-unit.target: Por padrão, o <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> controle é exibido como uma caixa de listagem suspensa.

trans-unit.source: If you allow multiple selections (by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Multiple%2A> property to `true`) or specify a height greater than one row (by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Size%2A> property to a value greater than `1`), the control is displayed as a list box.
trans-unit.target: Se você permitir que várias seleções (definindo o <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Multiple%2A> propriedade `true`) ou especifique uma altura maior do que uma linha (definindo o <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Size%2A> propriedade para um valor maior que `1`), o controle é exibido como uma caixa de listagem.

trans-unit.source: To determine the selected item in a single-selection <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.SelectedIndex%2A> property to get the index of the selected item.
trans-unit.target: Para determinar o item selecionado em uma única seleção <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> controlar, use o <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.SelectedIndex%2A> propriedade para obter o índice do item selecionado.

trans-unit.source: You can then use this value to retrieve the item from the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Items%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: Você pode usar esse valor para recuperar o item do <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Items%2A> coleção.

trans-unit.source: To determine the selected items from an <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control that allows multiple selections, iterate through the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Items%2A> collection and test the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem.Selected%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property of each item.
trans-unit.target: Para determinar os itens selecionados de um <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> iterar de controle que permita várias seleções, o <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Items%2A> coleta e teste o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem.Selected%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> propriedade de cada item.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> class provides two properties to support data binding.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> classe fornece duas propriedades para dar suporte à associação de dados.

trans-unit.source: To bind data to any object that implements the <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable?displayProperty=nameWithType> interface (such as <xref:System.Data.DataView?displayProperty=nameWithType>, <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList?displayProperty=nameWithType>, and <xref:System.Collections.Generic.List%601?displayProperty=nameWithType>), or the <xref:System.ComponentModel.IListSource> interface, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSource%2A> property to specify the data source to bind to.
trans-unit.target: Para associar dados a qualquer objeto que implementa o <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable?displayProperty=nameWithType> interface (como <xref:System.Data.DataView?displayProperty=nameWithType>, <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList?displayProperty=nameWithType>, e <xref:System.Collections.Generic.List%601?displayProperty=nameWithType>), ou o <xref:System.ComponentModel.IListSource> interface, use o <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSource%2A> propriedade para especificar a fonte de dados para associar a.

trans-unit.source: When you set the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSource%2A> property, you must manually write the code to perform the data binding.
trans-unit.target: Quando você define o <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSource%2A> propriedade manualmente você deve escrever o código para executar a associação de dados.

trans-unit.source: To automatically bind an <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control to a data source represented by a data source control, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSourceID%2A> property and set its value to the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A> property of the data source control to use.
trans-unit.target: Para vincular automaticamente um <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> controlar para uma fonte de dados representada por um controle de fonte de dados, use o <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSourceID%2A> propriedade e defina seu valor como o <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A> propriedade do controle de fonte de dados para usar.

trans-unit.source: When you set the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSourceID%2A> property, the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control automatically binds to the specified data source control.
trans-unit.target: Quando você define o <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSourceID%2A> propriedade, o <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> controle associa automaticamente para o controle de fonte de dados especificado.

trans-unit.source: Therefore, you do not need to explicitly call the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.DataBind%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Portanto, você não precisa chamar explicitamente o <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.DataBind%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: You can also specify which fields in the data source bind to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem.Text%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem.Value%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> properties of an item in the control by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataTextField%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataValueField%2A> properties, respectively.
trans-unit.target: Você também pode especificar quais campos na fonte de dados de ligação para o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem.Text%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> e <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem.Value%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> propriedades de um item no controle definindo o <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataTextField%2A> e <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataValueField%2A> propriedades, respectivamente.

trans-unit.source: If the data source contains multiple sources of data, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataMember%2A> property to specify the specific source to bind to the control.
trans-unit.target: Se a fonte de dados contiver várias fontes de dados, use o <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataMember%2A> propriedade para especificar a origem específica para associar ao controle.

trans-unit.source: For example, if you have a <xref:System.Data.DataSet?displayProperty=nameWithType> object with multiple tables, you must specify which table to bind to the control with the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataMember%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, se você tiver um <xref:System.Data.DataSet?displayProperty=nameWithType> do objeto com várias tabelas, você deve especificar qual tabela para associar o controle com o <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataMember%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: For a list of initial property values for an instance of <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>, see the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: Para obter uma lista de valores de propriedade inicial para uma instância do <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>, consulte o <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.%23ctor%2A> construtor.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to create an <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control by explicitly declaring the items that appear in the control.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra como criar um <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> controle declarando explicitamente os itens que aparecem no controle.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to create an <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control by binding the control to a data source.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra como criar um <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> controle associando o controle a uma fonte de dados.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSourceID%2A> property to specify the data source for an <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra como usar o <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSourceID%2A> propriedade para especificar a fonte de dados para um <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> controle.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSourceID%2A> property is set to the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource> control used to retrieve the data.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSourceID%2A> está definida como o <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A> propriedade o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource> controle usado para recuperar os dados.

trans-unit.source: When the page is loaded, the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control automatically binds to the data source specified by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource> control and the data is displayed to the user.
trans-unit.target: Quando a página for carregada, o <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> controle é vinculado automaticamente à fonte de dados especificado pelo <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource> controle e os dados são exibidos para o usuário.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect" />.

trans-unit.source: Use this constructor to create and initialize a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> class.
trans-unit.target: Use este construtor para criar e inicializar uma nova instância do <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> classe.

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property value for an instance of <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>.
trans-unit.target: A tabela a seguir mostra o valor da propriedade inicial para uma instância do <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>.

trans-unit.target: Propriedade

trans-unit.target: Valor inicial

trans-unit.target: A cadeia de caracteres literal "select".

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to dynamically create an instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control and place it on the Web page.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra como criar dinamicamente uma instância do <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> controlar e colocá-lo na página da Web.

trans-unit.source: The parsed child control to add.
trans-unit.target: O controle filho analisado a adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Adds a parsed child control to the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect" /> control.
trans-unit.target: Adiciona um controle filho analisado ao controle <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.AddParsedSubObject%2A> method is used by ASP.NET to add parsed child controls to the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.AddParsedSubObject%2A> método é usado pelo ASP.NET para adicionar controles filho analisado para a <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> controle.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to override the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.AddParsedSubObject%2A> method in a custom server control so that it always checks that an instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem> class is added to the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> selected items collection.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra como substituir o <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.AddParsedSubObject%2A> método em um servidor personalizado de controle para que ele sempre verifica se uma instância do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem> classe é adicionada ao <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> selecionados a coleção de itens.

trans-unit.source: The child control specified by the <paramref name="obj" /> parameter must be of the type <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem" />.
trans-unit.target: O controle filho especificado pelo parâmetro <paramref name="obj" /> deve ser do tipo <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem" />.

trans-unit.source: Clears the list selection of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect" /> control and sets the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem.Selected" /> property of all items to <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: Limpa a seleção de lista do controle <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect" /> e define a propriedade <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem.Selected" /> de todos os itens como <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.ClearSelection%2A> method iterates through the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItemCollection> collection represented by the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control's <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Items%2A> property and sets the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem.Selected%2A> property of each <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem> object to `false`.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.ClearSelection%2A> método itera por meio o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItemCollection> coleção representado pelo <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> do controle <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Items%2A> propriedade e configura o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem.Selected%2A> propriedade de cada <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem> do objeto para `false`.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to override the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.ClearSelection%2A> method in a custom server control so that it always clears all selected items of an <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> collection.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra como substituir o <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.ClearSelection%2A> método em um servidor personalizado de controle para que ele sempre limpa todos os itens selecionados de um <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> coleção.

trans-unit.source: Creates an <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.EmptyControlCollection" /> object for the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect" /> control.
trans-unit.target: Cria um objeto <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.EmptyControlCollection" /> para o controle <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ControlCollection" /> to contain the current server control's child server controls.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ControlCollection" /> para conter controles de servidor filho do controle de servidor atual.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control does not allow child controls.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> controle não permite controles filho.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the set of data to bind to the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect" /> control from a <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSource" /> property with multiple sets of data.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o conjunto de dados para associar o controle <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect" /> de uma propriedade <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSource" /> com vários conjuntos de dados.

trans-unit.source: The set of data to bind to the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect" /> control from a <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSource" /> with multiple sets of data.
trans-unit.target: O conjunto de dados para associar o <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect" /> de controle de um <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSource" /> com vários conjuntos de dados.

trans-unit.source: The default value is an empty string (""), which indicates the property has not been set.
trans-unit.target: O valor padrão é uma cadeia de caracteres vazia (""), que indica a propriedade não foi definido.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSource%2A> property contains multiple sets of data, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataMember%2A> property to specify which set of data to bind to the control.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSource%2A> propriedade contém vários conjuntos de dados, use o <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataMember%2A> propriedade para especificar qual conjunto de dados para associar ao controle.

trans-unit.source: For example, if you have a <xref:System.Data.DataSet?displayProperty=nameWithType> object with multiple tables, use this property to indicate which table to bind to the control.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, se você tiver um <xref:System.Data.DataSet?displayProperty=nameWithType> de objeto com várias tabelas, use esta propriedade para indicar qual tabela para associar ao controle.

trans-unit.source: After you have specified the data source to bind to the control, you can then specify which fields from the data source to bind to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem.Text%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem.Value%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> properties of each item in the control by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataTextField%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataValueField%2A> properties, respectively.
trans-unit.target: Depois de especificar a fonte de dados para associar ao controle, você pode especificar quais campos da fonte de dados para associar o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem.Text%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> e <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem.Value%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> propriedades de cada item no controle definindo o <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataTextField%2A> e <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataValueField%2A> propriedades, respectivamente.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataMember%2A> property to specify a set of data to bind to the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control from a <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSource%2A> property with multiple sets of data.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra como usar o <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataMember%2A> propriedade para especificar um conjunto de dados para associar ao <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> de controle de um <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSource%2A> propriedade com vários conjuntos de dados.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataMember" /> property is set during the data-binding phase of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect" /> control.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataMember" /> é definida durante a fase de associação de dados do controle <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the source of information to bind to the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect" /> control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a origem das informações para associar ao controle <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect" />.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Collections.IEnumerable" /> or <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.IListSource" /> that contains a collection of values used to supply data to this control.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Collections.IEnumerable" /> ou <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.IListSource" /> que contém uma coleção de valores usada para fornecer dados a este controle.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: O valor padrão é <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSource%2A> property to specify the data source to bind to the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSource%2A> propriedade para especificar a fonte de dados para associar o <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> controle.

trans-unit.source: A data source must be a collection that implements either the <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable?displayProperty=nameWithType> interface (such as <xref:System.Data.DataView?displayProperty=nameWithType>, <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList?displayProperty=nameWithType>, or <xref:System.Collections.Generic.List%601?displayProperty=nameWithType>) or the <xref:System.ComponentModel.IListSource> interface.
trans-unit.target: Uma fonte de dados deve ser uma coleção que implementa o o <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable?displayProperty=nameWithType> interface (como <xref:System.Data.DataView?displayProperty=nameWithType>, <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList?displayProperty=nameWithType>, ou <xref:System.Collections.Generic.List%601?displayProperty=nameWithType>) ou o <xref:System.ComponentModel.IListSource> interface.

trans-unit.source: When you set the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSource%2A> property, you must manually write the code to perform data binding.
trans-unit.target: Quando você define o <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSource%2A> propriedade manualmente você deve escrever o código para executar associação de dados.

trans-unit.source: If the data source contains multiple sets of data, such as a <xref:System.Data.DataSet?displayProperty=nameWithType> object with multiple tables, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataMember%2A> property to specify which data set to bind to the control.
trans-unit.target: Se a fonte de dados contém vários conjuntos de dados, como um <xref:System.Data.DataSet?displayProperty=nameWithType> do objeto com várias tabelas, use o <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataMember%2A> propriedade para especificar o conjunto de dados para associar ao controle.

trans-unit.source: You can specify which fields from the data source to bind to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem.Text%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem.Value%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> properties of each item in the control by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataTextField%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataValueField%2A> properties, respectively.
trans-unit.target: Você pode especificar quais campos da fonte de dados para associar o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem.Text%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> e <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem.Value%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> propriedades de cada item no controle definindo o <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataTextField%2A> e <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataValueField%2A> propriedades, respectivamente.

trans-unit.source: Alternately, you can use the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSourceID%2A> property to automatically bind to a data source represented by a data source control.
trans-unit.target: Como alternativa, você pode usar o <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSourceID%2A> propriedade para associar automaticamente a uma fonte de dados representada por um controle de fonte de dados.

trans-unit.source: When you set the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSourceID%2A> property, the data listing control automatically binds to the specified data source control.
trans-unit.target: Quando você define o <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSourceID%2A> propriedade, os dados de controle de listagem automaticamente associa ao controle de fonte de dados especificado.

trans-unit.source: You do not need to write code that explicitly calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.DataBind%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Você não precisa escrever código que explicitamente chama o <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.DataBind%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: If values are specified for both the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSource%2A> property and the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSourceID%2A> property, ASP.NET is not able to resolve the data source and a <xref:System.Web.HttpException?displayProperty=nameWithType> exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: Se os valores são especificados para ambos o <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSource%2A> propriedade e o <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSourceID%2A> propriedade, o ASP.NET não é capaz de resolver a fonte de dados e um <xref:System.Web.HttpException?displayProperty=nameWithType> exceção será lançada.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSource%2A> property to specify the source of information to bind to the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra como usar o <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSource%2A> propriedade para especificar a fonte de informações para associar o <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> controle.

trans-unit.source: The specified data source is not compatible with either <see cref="T:System.Collections.IEnumerable" /> or <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.IListSource" />, and it is not <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: A fonte de dados especificada não é compatível com <see cref="T:System.Collections.IEnumerable" /> nem com <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.IListSource" /> e não é <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: The data source cannot be resolved because a value is specified for both the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSource" /> property and the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSourceID" /> property.
trans-unit.target: A fonte de dados não pode ser resolvida porque foi especificado um valor para as propriedades <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSource" /> e <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSourceID" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Control.ID" /> property of the data source control that the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect" /> control should use to retrieve its data source.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a propriedade <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Control.ID" /> do controle de fonte de dados que o controle <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect" /> deve usar para recuperar a fonte de dados.

trans-unit.source: The programmatic identifier assigned to the data source control.
trans-unit.target: O identificador programático atribuído ao controle de fonte de dados.

trans-unit.source: The default value is an empty string (""), which indicates that the property has not been set.
trans-unit.target: O valor padrão é uma cadeia de caracteres vazia (""), que indica que a propriedade não foi definida.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSourceID%2A> property to set or access the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A> property of the data source control that the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control should use to retrieve its data source.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSourceID%2A> propriedade para definir ou acessar o <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A> propriedade da fonte de dados de controle que o <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> controle deve usar para recuperar a fonte de dados.

trans-unit.source: The data source control referenced by the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSourceID%2A> property can be any control that implements the <xref:System.Web.UI.IDataSource> interface.
trans-unit.target: A fonte de dados controle referenciado pelo <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSourceID%2A> propriedade pode ser qualquer controle que implementa o <xref:System.Web.UI.IDataSource> interface.

trans-unit.source: The data source control must exist either in the same naming container as the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control that references it or in a parent control of the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control.
trans-unit.target: O controle de fonte de dados deve existir no mesmo contêiner de nomeação, como o <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> controle que faz referência a ele ou em um controle pai o <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> controle.

trans-unit.source: When you specify a value for this property, the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control automatically binds to the specified data source control.
trans-unit.target: Quando você especificar um valor para essa propriedade, o <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> controle associa automaticamente para o controle de fonte de dados especificado.

trans-unit.source: You do not need to write code that explicitly calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.DataBind%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Você não precisa escrever código que explicitamente chama o <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.DataBind%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: Alternately, you can use the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSource%2A> property to specify the source of values to bind to an <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control.
trans-unit.target: Como alternativa, você pode usar o <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSource%2A> propriedade para especificar a origem dos valores para associar a um <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> controle.

trans-unit.source: The data source must be a collection that implements the <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable?displayProperty=nameWithType> interface (such as <xref:System.Data.DataView?displayProperty=nameWithType>, <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList?displayProperty=nameWithType>, or <xref:System.Collections.Generic.List%601?displayProperty=nameWithType>) or the <xref:System.ComponentModel.IListSource> interface.
trans-unit.target: A fonte de dados deve ser uma coleção que implementa o <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable?displayProperty=nameWithType> interface (como <xref:System.Data.DataView?displayProperty=nameWithType>, <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList?displayProperty=nameWithType>, ou <xref:System.Collections.Generic.List%601?displayProperty=nameWithType>) ou o <xref:System.ComponentModel.IListSource> interface.

trans-unit.source: When you set the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSource%2A> property, you must manually write the code to perform data binding.
trans-unit.target: Quando você define o <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSource%2A> propriedade manualmente você deve escrever o código para executar associação de dados.

trans-unit.source: If values are specified for both the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSource%2A> property and the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSourceID%2A> property, ASP.NET is not able to resolve the data source and a <xref:System.Web.HttpException?displayProperty=nameWithType> exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: Se os valores são especificados para ambos o <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSource%2A> propriedade e o <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSourceID%2A> propriedade, o ASP.NET não é capaz de resolver a fonte de dados e um <xref:System.Web.HttpException?displayProperty=nameWithType> exceção será lançada.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSourceID%2A> property to specify the data source for an <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra como usar o <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSourceID%2A> propriedade para especificar a fonte de dados para um <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> controle.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSourceID%2A> property is set to the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource> control used to retrieve the data.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSourceID%2A> está definida como o <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A> propriedade o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource> controle usado para recuperar os dados.

trans-unit.source: When the page is loaded, the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control automatically binds to the data source specified by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource> control and the data is displayed to the user.
trans-unit.target: Quando a página for carregada, o <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> controle é vinculado automaticamente à fonte de dados especificado pelo <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource> controle e os dados são exibidos para o usuário.

trans-unit.source: The data source cannot be resolved because a value is specified for both the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSource" /> property and the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSourceID" /> property.
trans-unit.target: A fonte de dados não pode ser resolvida porque foi especificado um valor para as propriedades <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSource" /> e <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSourceID" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the field from the data source to bind to the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem.Text" /> property of each item in the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect" /> control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o campo da fonte de dados para associar à propriedade <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem.Text" /> de cada item no controle <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect" />.

trans-unit.source: The field from the data source to bind to the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem.Text" /> property of each item in the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect" /> control.
trans-unit.target: O campo da fonte de dados para associar à propriedade <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem.Text" /> de cada item no controle <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect" />.

trans-unit.source: The default value is an empty string (""), which indicates that the property has not been set.
trans-unit.target: O valor padrão é uma cadeia de caracteres vazia (""), que indica que a propriedade não foi definida.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataTextField%2A> property to specify which field from the data source to bind to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem.Text%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property of each item in the control.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataTextField%2A> propriedade para especificar qual campo da fonte de dados para associar ao <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem.Text%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> propriedade de cada item no controle.

trans-unit.source: This property is commonly used to provide a value for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem.Text%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property that differs from the value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem.Value%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property.
trans-unit.target: Essa propriedade normalmente é usada para fornecer um valor para o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem.Text%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> que difere do valor da propriedade de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem.Value%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> class provides two properties for specifying the data source to bind to.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> classe fornece duas propriedades para especificar a fonte de dados para associar a.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSource%2A> property allows you to bind an <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control to any collection that implements the <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable?displayProperty=nameWithType> or <xref:System.ComponentModel.IListSource?displayProperty=nameWithType> interfaces (such as <xref:System.Data.DataView?displayProperty=nameWithType>, <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList?displayProperty=nameWithType>, or <xref:System.Collections.Generic.List%601?displayProperty=nameWithType>).
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSource%2A> propriedade permite que você associe um <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> controle em qualquer coleção que implementa o <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable?displayProperty=nameWithType> ou <xref:System.ComponentModel.IListSource?displayProperty=nameWithType> interfaces (como <xref:System.Data.DataView?displayProperty=nameWithType>, <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList?displayProperty=nameWithType>, ou <xref:System.Collections.Generic.List%601?displayProperty=nameWithType>).

trans-unit.source: When you use the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSource%2A> property to specify the data source, you must explicitly call the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.DataBind%2A> method to bind the control and its <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataTextField%2A> property to the data source.
trans-unit.target: Quando você usa o <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSource%2A> propriedade para especificar a fonte de dados, você deve chamar explicitamente o <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.DataBind%2A> método para associar o controle e sua <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataTextField%2A> propriedade para a fonte de dados.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSourceID%2A> property allows you to bind an <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control to a data source control that represents a data source.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSourceID%2A> propriedade permite que você associe um <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> controle a um controle de fonte de dados que representa uma fonte de dados.

trans-unit.source: When you use the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSourceID%2A> property to specify the data source, the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control and its <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataTextField%2A> property automatically bind to the specified data source control.
trans-unit.target: Quando você usa o <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSourceID%2A> propriedade para especificar a fonte de dados, o <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> controle e sua <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataTextField%2A> propriedade automaticamente a associação com o controle de fonte de dados especificado.

trans-unit.source: Therefore, you do not need to explicitly call the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.DataBind%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Portanto, você não precisa chamar explicitamente o <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.DataBind%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSource%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataTextField%2A> properties to specify the field from the data source to bind to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem.Text%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property of each item in the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra como usar o <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSource%2A> e <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataTextField%2A> propriedades para especificar o campo da fonte de dados para associar ao <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem.Text%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> propriedade de cada item de <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> controle.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSourceID%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataTextField%2A> properties to specify the field from the data source to bind to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem.Value%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property of each item in the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra como usar o <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSourceID%2A> e <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataTextField%2A> propriedades para especificar o campo da fonte de dados para associar ao <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem.Value%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> propriedade de cada item de <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> controle.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the field from the data source to bind to the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem.Value" /> property of each item in the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect" /> control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o campo da fonte de dados para associar à propriedade <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem.Value" /> de cada item no controle <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect" />.

trans-unit.target: O campo da fonte de dados para associar à propriedade <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem.Value" /> de cada item no controle <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect" />.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataValueField%2A> property to specify which field from the data source to bind to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem.Value%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property of each item in the control.

trans-unit.source: Verifies that the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect" /> control requires data binding and that a valid data source control is specified before calling the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Control.DataBind" /> method.
trans-unit.target: Verifica se o controle <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect" /> requer associação de dados e se um controle de fonte de dados válido é especificado antes de chamar o método <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Control.DataBind" />.

trans-unit.source: When you specify a value for the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSourceID%2A> property, ASP.NET automatically binds the data listing control to the specified data source control.
trans-unit.target: Quando você especificar um valor para o <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSourceID%2A> propriedade, o ASP.NET automaticamente associa os dados de lista de controle para o controle de fonte de dados especificado.

trans-unit.source: When ASP.NET performs data binding for the control, it calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.EnsureDataBound%2A> method first to verify that the control has not already been data-bound and that a valid data source control that implements the <xref:System.Web.UI.IDataSource> interface is specified for its <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSourceID%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Quando o ASP.NET executa a associação de dados para o controle, ele chama o <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.EnsureDataBound%2A> método primeiro para verificar se o controle já não foi associado a dados e que uma fonte de dados válido controle que implementa o <xref:System.Web.UI.IDataSource> interface é especificada para sua <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSourceID%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.EnsureDataBound%2A> method then calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.DataBind%2A> method to ensure that the control is data-bound immediately after the call to this method.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.EnsureDataBound%2A> método chama o <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.DataBind%2A> método para garantir que o controle associado a dados imediatamente após a chamada a este método.

trans-unit.target: Se o comprimento da cadeia de caracteres representando o <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSourceID%2A> cadeia de caracteres de propriedade é maior que zero, em seguida, <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.IsBoundUsingDataSourceID%2A> retorna `true`.

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection that contains the items listed in an <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect" /> control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém uma coleção que contém os itens listados em um controle <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItemCollection" /> that contains the items listed in an <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect" /> control.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItemCollection" /> que contém os itens listados em um controle <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect" />.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Items%2A> collection to manage the items listed in the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Items%2A> coleção para gerenciar os itens listados no <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> controle.

trans-unit.source: You can programmatically add items to, remove items from, and insert items into the collection.
trans-unit.target: Programaticamente, você pode adicionar itens para remover itens da e inserir itens na coleção.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Items%2A> collection is commonly used to iterate through the items in the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Items%2A> coleção é comumente usada para iterar os itens a <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> controle.

trans-unit.source: For example, when multiple items are selected, you can iterate through the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Items%2A> collection to determine which items are selected.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, quando vários itens são selecionados, você pode iterar por meio de <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Items%2A> coleção para determinar quais itens são selecionados.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Items%2A> collection to iterate through the items in the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control and determine which items are selected.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra como usar o <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Items%2A> coleção para iterar os itens a <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> controlar e determinar quais itens são selecionados.

trans-unit.source: The key identifier for the control.
trans-unit.target: O identificador da chave do controle.

trans-unit.source: The collection of all incoming name values.
trans-unit.target: A coleção de todos os valores de nome de entrada.

trans-unit.source: Processes the postback data for the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect" /> control.
trans-unit.target: Processa os dados de postback para o controle <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect" />.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect" /> control's state has changed as a result of a postback; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se o estado do controle <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect" /> tiver sido alterado como resultado de um postback; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.LoadPostData%2A> method checks whether the postback data of the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control is different from its previous value, and if so, returns `true`.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.LoadPostData%2A> método verifica se os dados de postagem do <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> controle é diferente do seu valor anterior e, em caso afirmativo, retorna `true`.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control's <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Multiple%2A> property is `false`, indicating a single-selection <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control, then the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.LoadPostData%2A> method checks the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.SelectedIndex%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> do controle <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Multiple%2A> é de propriedade `false`, indicando uma seleção única <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> controle, o <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.LoadPostData%2A> método verifica o <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.SelectedIndex%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control's <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Multiple%2A> property is `true`, indicating a multiple-selection <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control, then the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.LoadPostData%2A> method checks the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.SelectedIndices%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> do controle <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Multiple%2A> é de propriedade `true`, indicando uma seleção múltipla <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> controle, o <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.LoadPostData%2A> método verifica o <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.SelectedIndices%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.LoadPostData%2A> method is used primarily by control developers extending the functionality of the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.LoadPostData%2A> método é usado principalmente por desenvolvedores de controle estender a funcionalidade do <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> controle.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.SelectedIndex" /> property was set to a value greater than the number of items in the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect" /> control or less than <see langword="-1" />.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.SelectedIndex" /> foi definida com um valor maior que o número de itens no controle <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect" /> ou menor que <see langword="-1" />.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Object" /> that represents the control state to be restored.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Object" /> que representa o estado de controle a ser restaurado.

trans-unit.source: Restores the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect" /> control's view state information from a previous page request that was saved by the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.SaveViewState" /> method.
trans-unit.target: Restaura as informações de estado de exibição do controle <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect" /> de uma solicitação de página anterior salva pelo método <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.SaveViewState" />.

trans-unit.source: This method is used primarily by the .NET Framework infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: Esse método é usado basicamente pela infraestrutura do .NET Framework e não se destina a ser usado diretamente no seu código.

trans-unit.source: However, control developers can override this method to specify how a custom server control restores its view state.
trans-unit.target: No entanto, os desenvolvedores de controle podem substituir este método para especificar como um controle de servidor personalizado restaura o estado de exibição.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [ASP.NET State Management Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0218d965-5d30-445b-b6a6-8870e70e63ce).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [visão geral do gerenciamento de estado ASP.NET](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0218d965-5d30-445b-b6a6-8870e70e63ce).

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control's view state is stored as a <xref:System.Web.UI.Triplet> object.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> o estado de exibição do controle é armazenado como um <xref:System.Web.UI.Triplet> objeto.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Triplet.First> field of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Triplet> object holds the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control's base view state.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Triplet.First> campo o <xref:System.Web.UI.Triplet> objeto mantém o <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> estado de exibição básica do controle.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Triplet.Second> field of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Triplet> object holds the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItemCollection> collection represented by the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Items%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Triplet.Second> campo o <xref:System.Web.UI.Triplet> objeto mantém o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItemCollection> coleção representado pelo <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Items%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Triplet.Third> field of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Triplet> object holds the selected indices represented by the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.SelectedIndices%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Triplet.Third> campo o <xref:System.Web.UI.Triplet> objeto contém os índices selecionados representados pelo <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.SelectedIndices%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.LoadViewState%2A> method calls the base class's <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlContainerControl.LoadViewState%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method to restore the control's base view state.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.LoadViewState%2A> chamadas de método da classe base <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlContainerControl.LoadViewState%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> método para restaurar o estado de exibição básica do controle.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.LoadViewState%2A> method is used primarily by control developers extending the functionality of the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.LoadViewState%2A> método é usado principalmente por desenvolvedores de controle estender a funcionalidade do <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> controle.

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.LoadViewState(System.Object)" /> in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.LoadViewState(System.Object)" /> method so that the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect" /> control's view state is properly managed.
trans-unit.target: Ao substituir <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.LoadViewState(System.Object)" /> em uma classe derivada, certifique-se de chamar a classe base <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.LoadViewState(System.Object)" /> método para que o <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect" /> gerenciamento adequado do estado de exibição do controle.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether multiple items can be selected concurrently in the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect" /> control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se vários itens podem ser selecionados ao mesmo tempo no controle <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect" />.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if multiple items can be concurrently selected in the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect" /> control; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se vários itens podem ser selecionados ao mesmo tempo no controle <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect" />; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: O valor padrão é <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Multiple%2A> property to specify whether multiple items can be concurrently selected in the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Multiple%2A> propriedade para especificar se vários itens podem ser selecionados ao mesmo tempo no <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> controle.

trans-unit.source: By default, the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control is displayed as a drop-down list box.
trans-unit.target: Por padrão, o <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> controle é exibido como uma caixa de listagem suspensa.

trans-unit.source: If you allow multiple selections (by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Multiple%2A> property to `true`) or specify a height greater than one row (by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Size%2A> property to a value greater than `1`), the control is displayed as a list box.
trans-unit.target: Se você permitir que várias seleções (definindo o <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Multiple%2A> propriedade `true`) ou especifique uma altura maior do que uma linha (definindo o <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Size%2A> propriedade para um valor maior que `1`), o controle é exibido como uma caixa de listagem.

trans-unit.source: To determine the selected items in an <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control that allows multiple simultaneous selections, iterate through the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Items%2A> collection and test the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem.Selected%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property of each item.
trans-unit.target: Para determinar os itens selecionados em um <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> controle que permita várias seleções simultâneas, percorrer o <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Items%2A> coleta e teste o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem.Selected%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> propriedade de cada item.

trans-unit.source: The `multiple` attribute is rendered in the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control only if this property is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: O `multiple` atributo é renderizado no <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> controlar somente se essa propriedade é definida como `true`.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Multiple%2A> property to specify whether multiple items can be selected in the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra como usar o <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Multiple%2A> propriedade para especificar se vários itens podem ser selecionados no <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> controle.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the unique identifier name associated with the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect" /> control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o nome de identificador associado ao controle <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect" />.

trans-unit.source: The unique identifier name associated with the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect" /> control.
trans-unit.target: O nome de identificador exclusivo associado a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect" /> controle.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Name%2A> property to determine the unique identifier name for an <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Name%2A> propriedade para determinar o nome de identificador exclusivo para um <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> controle.

trans-unit.source: In this implementation, the `get` accessor returns the value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.UniqueID%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property.
trans-unit.target: Nessa implementação, o `get` acessador retorna o valor da <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.UniqueID%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: However, the `set` accessor does not assign a value to this property.
trans-unit.target: No entanto, o `set` acessador não atribui um valor para essa propriedade.

trans-unit.source: The `set` accessor does not assign a value to this property because the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Name%2A> property must have the same value as the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.UniqueID%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property for the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control to work properly.
trans-unit.target: O `set` acessador não atribuir um valor para essa propriedade porque a <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Name%2A> propriedade deve ter o mesmo valor que o <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.UniqueID%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> propriedade para o <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> controle funcione corretamente.

trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra como usar o <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Name%2A> propriedade o <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> controle para selecionar um item específico no <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Items%2A> lista.

trans-unit.target: Aciona o evento <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.Control.DataBinding" /> de um controle <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.DataBinding> event is raised when data is bound to the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.DataBinding> evento é gerado quando os dados serão associados ao <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> controle.

trans-unit.source: This method notifies the control to perform any data-binding logic that is associated with it.
trans-unit.target: Este método notifica o controle para executar qualquer lógica de associação de dados que está associada ele.

trans-unit.source: Specifically, the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.OnDataBinding%2A> method creates the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Items%2A> collection from the data source specified in either the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSource%2A> property or the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSourceID%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Especificamente, o <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.OnDataBinding%2A> método cria o <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Items%2A> coleção da fonte de dados especificada em qualquer uma de <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSource%2A> propriedade ou o <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSourceID%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: A geração de um evento invoca o manipulador de eventos por meio de um delegado.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [tratamento e gerando eventos](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.OnDataBinding%2A> method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.OnDataBinding%2A> método também permite que classes derivadas manipular o evento sem anexar um representante.

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: Isso é a técnica preferida para manipular o evento em uma classe derivada.

trans-unit.target: A propriedade <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.SelectedIndex" /> foi definida com um valor maior que o número de itens no controle <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect" /> ou menor que <see langword="-1" />.

trans-unit.source: When overriding the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.OnDataBinding(System.EventArgs)" /> method in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Control.OnDataBinding(System.EventArgs)" /> method so that registered delegates receive the event.
trans-unit.target: Ao substituir o <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.OnDataBinding(System.EventArgs)" /> método em uma classe derivada, certifique-se de chamar a classe base <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Control.OnDataBinding(System.EventArgs)" /> método para que registrado delegados receber o evento.

trans-unit.source: Invoked when the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSource" />, <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataMember" />, or <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSourceID" /> property is changed.
trans-unit.target: É invocado quando a propriedade <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSource" />, <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataMember" /> ou <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSourceID" /> é alterada.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.OnDataPropertyChanged%2A> method sets the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.RequiresDataBinding%2A> property to `true` if the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSource%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataMember%2A>, or <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSourceID%2A> property has changed.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.OnDataPropertyChanged%2A> método define o <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.RequiresDataBinding%2A> propriedade `true` se o <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSource%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataMember%2A>, ou <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSourceID%2A> propriedade foi alterada.

trans-unit.source: An attempt was made to change the property value during the data-binding phase of the control.
trans-unit.target: Foi feita uma tentativa de alterar o valor da propriedade durante a fase de associação de dados do controle.

trans-unit.source: The source of the event.
trans-unit.target: A fonte do evento.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" /> que contém os dados do evento.

trans-unit.source: Invoked when the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSource" />, <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataMember" />, or <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSourceID" /> property is changed.
trans-unit.target: É invocado quando a propriedade <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSource" />, <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataMember" /> ou <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSourceID" /> é alterada.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.OnDataSourceViewChanged%2A> method sets the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.RequiresDataBinding%2A> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.OnDataSourceViewChanged%2A> método define o <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.RequiresDataBinding%2A> propriedade `true`.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" /> que contém os dados do evento.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.Control.Init" /> event for the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect" /> control.
trans-unit.target: Aciona o evento <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.Control.Init" /> do controle <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.OnInit%2A> method notifies the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control to perform any initialization steps that are required to create and set up an instance.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.OnInit%2A> método notifica o <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> controle para executar as etapas de inicialização que são necessárias para criar e configurar uma instância.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.IsViewStateEnabled%2A> property is `false` and the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.IsPostBack%2A> property is `true`, then the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.RequiresDataBinding%2A> property is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.IsViewStateEnabled%2A> é de propriedade `false` e o <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.IsPostBack%2A> é de propriedade `true`, em seguida, o <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.RequiresDataBinding%2A> está definida como `true`.

trans-unit.source: When overriding the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.OnInit(System.EventArgs)" /> method in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.OnInit(System.EventArgs)" /> method so that the registered delegates received the event.
trans-unit.target: Ao substituir o <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.OnInit(System.EventArgs)" /> método em uma classe derivada, certifique-se de chamar a classe base <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.OnInit(System.EventArgs)" /> método para que os delegados registrados receberam o evento.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" /> que contém os dados do evento.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.Control.Load" /> event for the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect" /> control.
trans-unit.target: Aciona o evento <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.Control.Load" /> do controle <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.OnLoad%2A> method notifies the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control that it should perform actions common to each HTTP request for the page it is associated with.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.OnLoad%2A> método notifica o <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> controlar que ele deve executar ações comuns a cada solicitação HTTP para a página está associado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.OnLoad%2A> method connects the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control to the appropriate data source specified in either the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSource%2A> property or the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSourceID%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.OnLoad%2A> método conecta o <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> controle à fonte de dados apropriado especificado no <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSource%2A> propriedade ou o <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSourceID%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSourceID%2A> property is to specify the data source control that the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control should use to retrieve its data source, then the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.OnDataSourceViewChanged%2A> method is set as the event handler.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSourceID%2A> é de propriedade para especificar a fonte de dados de controle que o <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> controle deve usar para recuperar a fonte de dados, em seguida, o <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.OnDataSourceViewChanged%2A> método está definido como o manipulador de eventos.

trans-unit.source: The ID specified in the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSourceID" /> property cannot be found.
trans-unit.target: Não é possível localizar a ID especificada na propriedade <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSourceID" />.

trans-unit.target: \- ou -

trans-unit.target: O controle especificado na propriedade <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSourceID" /> não é do tipo <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.IDataSource" />.

trans-unit.source: The data source cannot be resolved because a value is specified for both the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSource" /> property and the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSourceID" /> property.
trans-unit.target: A fonte de dados não pode ser resolvida porque foi especificado um valor para as propriedades <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSource" /> e <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSourceID" />.
