trans-unit.target: Não foi possível localizar a propriedade <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataMember" /> solicitada.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" /> que contém os dados do evento.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.Control.PreRender" /> event for the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect" /> control.
trans-unit.target: Aciona o evento <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.Control.PreRender" /> do controle <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect" />.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Size%2A> property is greater than 1, then the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.OnPreRender%2A> method registers the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control with the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page> control as one that requires postback processing.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Size%2A> propriedade é maior que 1, o <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.OnPreRender%2A> método registra o <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> controlar com o <xref:System.Web.UI.Page> controle como um que requer processamento de postback.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to override the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.OnPreRender%2A> method so that it allows multiple selections in a custom <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> server control.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra como substituir o <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.OnPreRender%2A> método para que ele permita várias seleções em um personalizado <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> controle de servidor.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" /> que contém os dados do evento.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.ServerChange" /> event of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect" /> control.
trans-unit.target: Aciona o evento <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.ServerChange" /> do controle <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect" />.

trans-unit.source: This allows you to provide a custom handler for the event.
trans-unit.target: Isso permite que você forneça um manipulador personalizado para o evento.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.ServerChange> event is raised when the selected items in the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control change between posts to the server.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.ServerChange> é gerado quando os itens selecionados no <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> alteração de controle entre postagens para o servidor.

trans-unit.source: This event is raised only when the user initiates a post to the server, such as by clicking a Submit button.
trans-unit.target: Esse evento é gerado apenas quando o usuário inicia um post para o servidor, como ao clicar em um botão de envio.

trans-unit.source: This event does not cause a post to the server to occur.
trans-unit.target: Esse evento não faz com que um post para o servidor ocorra.

trans-unit.source: The control must have view state enabled for the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.ServerChange> event to work correctly.
trans-unit.target: O controle deve ter o estado de exibição habilitado para o <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.ServerChange> evento funcione corretamente.

trans-unit.source: You can use this event to perform data validation on the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control when the user changes the selection in the control.
trans-unit.target: Você pode usar esse evento para realizar a validação de dados no <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> controlar quando o usuário altera a seleção no controle.

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: A geração de um evento invoca o manipulador de eventos por meio de um delegado.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [tratamento e gerando eventos](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.OnServerChange%2A> method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.OnServerChange%2A> método também permite que classes derivadas manipular o evento sem anexar um representante.

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: Isso é a técnica preferida para manipular o evento em uma classe derivada.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to specify and code an event handler for the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.ServerChange> event of the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra como especificar e codificar um manipulador de eventos para o <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.ServerChange> evento o <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> controle.

trans-unit.source: The event handler determines whether the selected items are compatible with each other.
trans-unit.target: O manipulador de eventos determina se os itens selecionados são compatíveis entre si.

trans-unit.source: When overriding the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.OnServerChange(System.EventArgs)" /> method in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.OnServerChange(System.EventArgs)" /> method so that registered delegates receive the event.
trans-unit.target: Ao substituir o <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.OnServerChange(System.EventArgs)" /> método em uma classe derivada, certifique-se de chamar a classe base <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.OnServerChange(System.EventArgs)" /> método para que registrado delegados receber o evento.

trans-unit.source: Calls the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.OnServerChange(System.EventArgs)" /> method to signal the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect" /> control that the state of the control has changed.
trans-unit.target: Chama o método <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.OnServerChange(System.EventArgs)" /> para sinalizar ao controle <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect" /> que o estado do controle foi alterado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.RaisePostDataChangedEvent%2A> method is used primarily by control developers extending the functionality of the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.RaisePostDataChangedEvent%2A> método é usado principalmente por desenvolvedores de controle estender a funcionalidade do <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> controle.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter" /> that receives the rendered content.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter" /> que recebe o conteúdo renderizado.

trans-unit.source: Renders the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect" /> control's attributes to the specified <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Renderiza os atributos do controle <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect" /> no objeto <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter" /> especificado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.RenderAttributes%2A> method renders the `name` attribute of the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control directly to ensure that it has the same value as the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.UniqueID%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.RenderAttributes%2A> método processa o `name` atributo do <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> controle diretamente para garantir que ele tem o mesmo valor que o <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.UniqueID%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: After rendering the attribute, the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.RenderAttributes%2A> method calls the base class's <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlContainerControl.RenderAttributes%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Após processar o atributo, o <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.RenderAttributes%2A> chamadas de método da classe base <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlContainerControl.RenderAttributes%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.RenderAttributes%2A> method is used primarily by control developers extending the functionality of the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.RenderAttributes%2A> método é usado principalmente por desenvolvedores de controle estender a funcionalidade do <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> controle.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to override the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.RenderAttributes%2A> method in a custom server control so that specific title text is always displayed for the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra como substituir o <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.RenderAttributes%2A> método em um servidor personalizado de controle para que o texto de título específico sempre é exibido para o <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> controle.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter" /> that receives the rendered content.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter" /> que recebe o conteúdo renderizado.

trans-unit.source: Renders the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect" /> control's child controls to the specified <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Renderiza os controles filho do controle <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect" /> no objeto <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter" /> especificado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.RenderChildren%2A> method overrides the base class's <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.RenderChildren%2A> method without calling the base method.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.RenderChildren%2A> método substitui a classe base <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.RenderChildren%2A> método sem chamar o método base.

trans-unit.source: Each of the `<option>` elements between the opening and closing `<select>` tags is rendered with a `value` attribute, a `selected` attribute if the item is selected, and its associated text.
trans-unit.target: Cada uma da `<option>` elementos entre a abertura e fechamento `<select>` marcas é processado com um `value` atributo, um `selected` atributo se o item é selecionado e seu texto associado.

trans-unit.source: If multiple items were selected but the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Multiple%2A> property is set to `false`, then an <xref:System.Web.HttpException> exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: Se foram selecionados vários itens, mas o <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Multiple%2A> está definida como `false`, então um <xref:System.Web.HttpException> exceção será lançada.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to override the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.RenderChildren%2A> method so that it always displays default option text in a custom <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> server control.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra como substituir o <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.RenderChildren%2A> método assim que ele sempre exibe o texto da opção padrão em um personalizado <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> controle de servidor.

trans-unit.source: Multiple items were selected but the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Multiple" /> property is set to <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: Foram selecionados vários itens, mas a propriedade <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Multiple" /> está definida para <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect" /> control needs to bind to its specified data source.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se o controle <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect" /> precisa se associar à respectiva fonte de dados especificada.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the control needs to bind to a data source; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> Se o controle precisa associar a uma fonte de dados; Caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control uses the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.RequiresDataBinding%2A> property to determine whether the control needs to call the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.DataBind%2A> method to bind to its specified data source.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> controlar usa o <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.RequiresDataBinding%2A> propriedade para determinar se o controle precisa chamar o <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.DataBind%2A> método para associar a fonte de dados especificado.

trans-unit.source: Each time the `set` accessor is called on either the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSource%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSourceID%2A>, or <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataMember%2A> property to change the data source after the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.OnInit%2A> method has already been called, ASP.NET automatically sets the value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.RequiresDataBinding%2A> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Cada vez que o `set` acessador for chamado em um a <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSource%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSourceID%2A>, ou <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataMember%2A> propriedade para alterar a fonte de dados após o <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.OnInit%2A> método já foi chamado, o ASP.NET define automaticamente o valor da <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.RequiresDataBinding%2A> propriedade para `true`.

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.RequiresDataBinding%2A> property is also set to `true` when the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.OnDataPropertyChanged%2A> method is invoked.
trans-unit.target: O valor da <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.RequiresDataBinding%2A> propriedade também é definida como `true` quando o <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.OnDataPropertyChanged%2A> método é invocado.

trans-unit.source: ASP.NET automatically sets the value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.RequiresDataBinding%2A> property to `false` immediately after the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.DataBind%2A> method has been called.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET define automaticamente o valor da <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.RequiresDataBinding%2A> propriedade `false` imediatamente após o <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.DataBind%2A> método foi chamado.

trans-unit.source: Saves any <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect" /> control view state changes that have occurred since the page was posted back to the server.
trans-unit.target: Salva alterações de estado de exibição do controle <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect" /> que ocorreram desde o postback da página no servidor.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Object" /> that contains the changes to the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect" /> view state.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Object" /> que contém as alterações ao estado de exibição <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect" />.

trans-unit.source: If no view state is associated with the object, this method returns a null reference (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: Se nenhum estado de exibição está associado ao objeto, esse método retorna uma referência nula (<see langword="Nothing" /> no Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control's view state is stored as a <xref:System.Web.UI.Triplet> object.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> o estado de exibição do controle é armazenado como um <xref:System.Web.UI.Triplet> objeto.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Triplet.First> field of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Triplet> object holds the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control's base view state.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Triplet.First> campo o <xref:System.Web.UI.Triplet> objeto mantém o <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> estado de exibição básica do controle.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Triplet.Second> field of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Triplet> object holds the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItemCollection> collection represented by the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Items%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Triplet.Second> campo o <xref:System.Web.UI.Triplet> objeto mantém o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItemCollection> coleção representado pelo <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Items%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Triplet.Third> field of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Triplet> object holds the selected indices represented by the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.SelectedIndices%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Triplet.Third> campo o <xref:System.Web.UI.Triplet> objeto contém os índices selecionados representados pelo <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.SelectedIndices%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.SaveViewState%2A> method calls the base class's <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.SaveViewState%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method to save the control's base view state.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.SaveViewState%2A> chamadas de método da classe base <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.SaveViewState%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> método para salvar o estado de exibição básica do controle.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.SaveViewState%2A> method is used primarily by control developers extending the functionality of the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.SaveViewState%2A> método é usado principalmente por desenvolvedores de controle estender a funcionalidade do <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> controle.

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.SaveViewState" /> in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.SaveViewState" /> method so that the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect" /> control's view state is properly managed.
trans-unit.target: Ao substituir <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.SaveViewState" /> em uma classe derivada, certifique-se de chamar a classe base <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.SaveViewState" /> método para que o <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect" /> gerenciamento adequado do estado de exibição do controle.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Array" /> of type <see cref="T:System.Int32" /> that contains the items to select.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Array" /> do tipo <see cref="T:System.Int32" /> que contém os itens a selecionar.

trans-unit.source: Selects multiple items of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect" /> control's <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Items" /> collection.
trans-unit.target: Selecione vários itens da coleção <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Items" /> do controle <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Select%2A> method selects multiple items of the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Items%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Select%2A> método seleciona vários itens do <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Items%2A> coleção.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the ordinal index of the selected item in an <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect" /> control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o índice ordinal do item selecionado no controle <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect" />.

trans-unit.source: The ordinal index of the selected item in an <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect" /> control.
trans-unit.target: O índice ordinal do item selecionado em um controle <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect" />.

trans-unit.source: A value of <see langword="-1" /> indicates that no item is selected.
trans-unit.target: Um valor de <see langword="-1" /> indica que nenhum item selecionado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.SelectedIndex%2A> property is commonly used to determine the index of the selected item in a single-selection <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.SelectedIndex%2A> propriedade normalmente é usada para determinar o índice do item selecionado em uma única seleção <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> controle.

trans-unit.source: This index can then be used to retrieve the item from the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Items%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: Esse índice, em seguida, pode ser usado para recuperar o item do <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Items%2A> coleção.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Multiple%2A> property is set to `true`, indicating that multiple items can be concurrently selected, the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.SelectedIndex%2A> property contains the index of the first selected item.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Multiple%2A> está definida como `true`, indicando que vários itens podem ser selecionados ao mesmo tempo, o <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.SelectedIndex%2A> propriedade contém o índice do primeiro item selecionado.

trans-unit.source: To determine the selected items from an <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control that allows multiple simultaneous selections, iterate through the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Items%2A> collection and test the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem.Selected%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property of each item.
trans-unit.target: Para determinar os itens selecionados de um <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> controle que permita várias seleções simultâneas, percorrer o <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Items%2A> coleta e teste o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem.Selected%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> propriedade de cada item.

trans-unit.source: It is possible to have no item selected.
trans-unit.target: É possível ter nenhum item selecionado.

trans-unit.source: If no item is selected, the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.SelectedIndex%2A> property contains a value of `-1`.
trans-unit.target: Se nenhum item for selecionado, o <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.SelectedIndex%2A> propriedade contém um valor de `-1`.

trans-unit.source: This commonly occurs when the page first loads and an item is not selected by default.
trans-unit.target: Isso normalmente ocorre quando a página for carregada pela primeira vez e um item não é selecionado por padrão.

trans-unit.source: Provide code to test this value before referencing the item in the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Items%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: Forneça o código para testar esse valor antes de consultar o item no <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Items%2A> coleção.

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, an exception is thrown if the index is out of the range of the collection.
trans-unit.target: Caso contrário, uma exceção é gerada se o índice está fora do intervalo da coleção.

trans-unit.source: By default, the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control is displayed as a drop-down list box.
trans-unit.target: Por padrão, o <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> controle é exibido como uma caixa de listagem suspensa.

trans-unit.source: If you allow multiple selections (by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Multiple%2A> property to `true`) or specify a height greater than one row (by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Size%2A> property to a value greater than `1`), the control is displayed as a list box.
trans-unit.target: Se você permitir que várias seleções (definindo o <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Multiple%2A> propriedade `true`) ou especifique uma altura maior do que uma linha (definindo o <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Size%2A> propriedade para um valor maior que `1`), o controle é exibido como uma caixa de listagem.

trans-unit.source: If a drop-down list box is displayed, an item is always selected.
trans-unit.target: Se for exibida uma caixa de listagem suspensa, um item sempre é selecionado.

trans-unit.source: If a list box is displayed, you can programmatically clear the selection from all items by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.SelectedIndex%2A> property to `-1`.
trans-unit.target: Se for exibida uma caixa de listagem, você pode desmarcar a seleção de todos os itens programaticamente, definindo o <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.SelectedIndex%2A> propriedade `-1`.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.SelectedIndex%2A> property to determine the index of the selected item in the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra como usar o <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.SelectedIndex%2A> propriedade para determinar o índice do item selecionado no <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> controle.

trans-unit.source: The index is then used to retrieve the selected item from the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Items%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: O índice, em seguida, é usado para recuperar o item selecionado do <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Items%2A> coleção.

trans-unit.source: The property was set to a value greater than the number of items in the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect" /> control or less than <see langword="-1" />.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade foi definida com um valor maior que o número de itens no controle <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect" /> ou menor que <see langword="-1" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection that contains the zero-based indexes of all currently selected items in the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect" /> control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém uma coleção que contém os índices com base em zero de todos os itens selecionados no momento no controle <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect" />.

trans-unit.source: A collection that contains the zero-based indexes of all currently selected items in the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect" /> control.
trans-unit.target: Uma coleção que contém atualmente os índices com base em zero de todos os itens selecionados no <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect" /> controle.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.SelectedIndices%2A> property is used by the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> class to return a collection that contains the zero-based indexes of all currently selected items in the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.SelectedIndices%2A> propriedade é usada pelo <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> classe para retornar uma coleção que contém atualmente os índices com base em zero de todos os itens selecionados no <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> controle.

trans-unit.source: Control developers extending the functionality of the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> class can override the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.SelectedIndices%2A> property to provide a custom algorithm for returning currently selected items.
trans-unit.target: Controlar os desenvolvedores estender a funcionalidade do <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> classe pode substituir o <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.SelectedIndices%2A> propriedade para fornecer um algoritmo personalizado de atualmente retornando os itens selecionados.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the selected items in the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect" /> control change between posts to the server.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando os itens selecionados no controle de <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect" /> se alteram entre as postagens no servidor.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.ServerChange> event is raised when the selected items in the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control change between posts to the server.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.ServerChange> é gerado quando os itens selecionados no <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> alteração de controle entre postagens para o servidor.

trans-unit.source: The control must have view state enabled for the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.ServerChange> event to work correctly.
trans-unit.target: O controle deve ter o estado de exibição habilitado para o <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.ServerChange> evento funcione corretamente.

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre a manipulação de eventos, consulte [NIB: consumindo eventos](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to specify and code an event handler declaratively for the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.ServerChange> event of the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra como especificar e codificar um manipulador de eventos declarativamente o <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.ServerChange> evento o <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> controle.

trans-unit.source: The event handler determines whether the selected items are compatible with each other.
trans-unit.target: O manipulador de eventos determina se os itens selecionados são compatíveis entre si.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to specify and code an event handler programmatically for the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.ServerChange> event of the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra como especificar e codificar um manipulador de eventos programaticamente o <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.ServerChange> evento o <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> controle.

trans-unit.source: The event handler determines whether the selected items are compatible with each other.
trans-unit.target: O manipulador de eventos determina se os itens selecionados são compatíveis entre si.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the height (in rows) of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect" /> control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a altura (em linhas) do controle <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect" />.

trans-unit.source: The height (in rows) of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect" /> control.
trans-unit.target: A altura (em linhas) da <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect" /> controle.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Size%2A> property to specify the height (in rows) of the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Size%2A> propriedade para especificar a altura (em linhas) da <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> controle.

trans-unit.source: If you specify a size that is smaller than the number of items in the control, scroll bars are displayed to allow you to move up and down the list.
trans-unit.target: Se você especificar um tamanho menor que o número de itens no controle, barras de rolagem são exibidas para que você possa mover para cima e a lista.

trans-unit.source: By default, the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control is displayed as a drop-down list box.
trans-unit.target: Por padrão, o <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> controle é exibido como uma caixa de listagem suspensa.

trans-unit.source: If you allow multiple selections (by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Multiple%2A> property to `true`) or specify a height greater than one row (by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Size%2A> property to a value greater than `1`), the control is displayed as a list box.
trans-unit.target: Se você permitir que várias seleções (definindo o <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Multiple%2A> propriedade `true`) ou especifique uma altura maior do que uma linha (definindo o <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Size%2A> propriedade para um valor maior que `1`), o controle é exibido como uma caixa de listagem.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Size%2A> property to specify the height (in rows) of the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra como usar o <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Size%2A> propriedade para especificar a altura (em linhas) da <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> controle.

trans-unit.source: The key identifier for the control.
trans-unit.target: O identificador da chave do controle.

trans-unit.source: The collection of all incoming name values.
trans-unit.target: A coleção de todos os valores de nome de entrada.

trans-unit.source: For a description of this member, see <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.IPostBackDataHandler.LoadPostData(System.String,System.Collections.Specialized.NameValueCollection)" />.
trans-unit.target: Para obter uma descrição desse membro, consulte <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.IPostBackDataHandler.LoadPostData(System.String,System.Collections.Specialized.NameValueCollection)" />.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect" /> control's state has changed as a result of a postback; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se o estado do controle <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect" /> tiver sido alterado como resultado de um postback; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: Este membro é uma implementação do membro de interface explícita.

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Web.UI.IPostBackDataHandler> interface.
trans-unit.target: Ele só pode ser usado quando a instância de <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> é convertida em uma interface de <xref:System.Web.UI.IPostBackDataHandler>.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.SelectedIndex" /> property was set to a value greater than the number of items in the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect" /> control or less than <see langword="-1" />.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.SelectedIndex" /> foi definida com um valor maior que o número de itens no controle <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect" /> ou menor que <see langword="-1" />.

trans-unit.source: For a description of this member, see <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.IPostBackDataHandler.RaisePostDataChangedEvent" />.
trans-unit.target: Para obter uma descrição desse membro, consulte <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.IPostBackDataHandler.RaisePostDataChangedEvent" />.

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: Este membro é uma implementação do membro de interface explícita.

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Web.UI.IPostBackDataHandler> interface.
trans-unit.target: Ele só pode ser usado quando a instância de <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> é convertida em uma interface de <xref:System.Web.UI.IPostBackDataHandler>.

trans-unit.source: Tracks view state changes to the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect" /> control so the changes can be stored in the control's <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.StateBag" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Rastreia alterações de estado de exibição no controle <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect" /> de modo que as alterações podem ser armazenadas no objeto <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.StateBag" /> do controle.

trans-unit.source: This object is accessible through the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Control.ViewState" /> property.
trans-unit.target: Esse objeto é acessível por meio da propriedade <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Control.ViewState" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.TrackViewState%2A> method persists items in the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Items%2A> collection of the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control to view state.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.TrackViewState%2A> método persiste itens o <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Items%2A> coleção do <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> controle no estado de exibição.

trans-unit.source: Gets the value of the selected item in the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect" /> control or sets the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.SelectedIndex" /> property of the control to the index of the first item in the list with the specified value.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o valor do item selecionado no controle <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect" /> ou define a propriedade <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.SelectedIndex" /> do controle para o índice do primeiro item na lista com o valor especificado.

trans-unit.source: The value of the selected item in the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect" /> control.
trans-unit.target: O valor do item selecionado no controle <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect" />.

trans-unit.source: If no item is selected in the control, <see cref="F:System.String.Empty" /> is returned.
trans-unit.target: Se nenhum item selecionado no controle, <see cref="F:System.String.Empty" /> será retornado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Value%2A> property is commonly used to get the value of the item referenced by the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.SelectedIndex%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Value%2A> propriedade normalmente é usada para obter o valor do item referenciado pelo <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.SelectedIndex%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: If no item is selected in the control, <xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=nameWithType> is returned.
trans-unit.target: Se nenhum item selecionado no controle, <xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=nameWithType> será retornado.

trans-unit.source: If you set this property to a value, the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.SelectedIndex%2A> property is updated with the index of the first item in the list that contains that value.
trans-unit.target: Se você definir essa propriedade como um valor, o <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.SelectedIndex%2A> propriedade é atualizada com o índice do primeiro item na lista que contém o valor.

trans-unit.source: If no matching value is found, the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.SelectedIndex%2A> property is left unchanged.
trans-unit.target: Se nenhum valor correspondente for encontrado, o <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.SelectedIndex%2A> propriedade fica inalterado.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Value%2A> property to get the value of the selected item in the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra como usar o <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Value%2A> propriedade para obter o valor do item selecionado no <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> controle.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Value" /> property was set to an item greater than the number of items in the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect" /> control or less than <see langword="-1" />.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Value" /> foi definida com um item maior que o número de itens no controle <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect" /> ou menor que <see langword="-1" />.
